content: क्रंद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (क्रंदति, चक्रंद, अक्रंदीत्, क्रंदित) {@--1@} To cry, weep, shed tears; किं क्रंदसि दुराक्रंद स्वपक्षक्षयकारक <ls>Pt. 4. 29</ls>; क्रंदत्यतः करुणमप्सरसां गणोऽयं <ls>V. 1. 3</ls>; चक्रंद विग्ना कुररीव भूयः <ls>R. 14. 68</ls>; <ls n="R.">15. 42</ls>; <ls>Bk. 3. 28</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">5. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To call out to, call out piteously to any one, (with <ab>acc.</ab>); क्रंदत्यविरतं सोऽथ भ्रातृमातृसुतानथ <ls>Mārk. P.</ls> {@--3@} To cry out, exclaim. {@--4@} To yell, howl. {@--5@} To neigh (as a horse). {@--6@} To roar. {@--7@} To creak (as a wheel). --{c10c} <ab>P.</ab> or {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cry out continuously. {@--2@} To roar, rave. {@--3@} To cause to weep.
